text: Mordellistena is a genus (type) of beetles in the family Mordellidae. It contains many species.Mordellidae Species List at Joel Hallanâ€™s Biology Catalog. Texas A&M; University. Retrieved on 20 December 2012. They are "tumbling flower beetles", so-called for the typical irregular movements they make when escaping predators. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Polyphaga
